provider: Pointickets is a secondary ticket provider.
login_now: You must be logged in to be able to buy or sell a ticket

Register.name: Name
Register.send: We've sent you an email to confirm your account. Remember to check your spam.

Home.title: Real Madrid tickets and other sports events
Home.Buy_and_sell_tickets_in_just_a_few_click: Buy and sell tickets in just a few clicks.
Home.second_title: My passion, my sport, my seat - My Real Madrid tickets
Home.pre_title: Pointickets makes it easy for you! Here you will find the cheapest tickets to see Real Madrid.
Home.leader_buy: Can you imagine watching Bellingham score a stunning goal and Mbappé breaking down the wing? Or Vinicius celebrating with the fans? Do you want to experience strong emotions and save money?
Home.pointickets_tickets: We know that the thrill of attending a live sporting event is an unparalleled experience. However, it can sometimes be tricky to find available tickets, especially for popular and highly demanded events. That's where we come in, helping you find the best tickets to see Real Madrid at the best price. Our mission is to ensure that your experience at Santiago Bernabéu is as exciting as the event itself, which is why we specialize in buying and selling tickets at competitive prices.
Home.pointickets_tickets_second: At Pointickets, we understand that you want to experience those special moments, which is why we strive to offer you Real Madrid tickets at affordable prices. We want you to enjoy the show without worrying about money and to have the chance to be part of the event you love so much.
Home.pointickets_tickets_finish: Feel the magic of Santiago Bernabéu!
Home.opinion_text: Our goal is to provide our customers with a simple and secure shopping experience. Therefore, we work with the main online payment entities and have state-of-the-art security systems.
Home.keep_information: Stay informed of all the latest sports events
Home.contact_us: Contact us via Whatsapp or complete this form.
Home.keep_information_events: Stay informed of all the latest sports events.
Home.readed: I have read and accept the terms and conditions of use.

Menu.tickets_alert: tickets sold in the last 24 hours

Events.title: Buy football tickets to your favourite events
Events.title_sell: Sell football tickets to your favourite events
Events.second_title: Live the white passion! Your Real Madrid tickets are waiting for you
Events.paragraph_1: This year, don't miss the chance to experience something unique in one of the most iconic stadiums in the world. Come witness the magic of football at Santiago Bernabéu, where Real Madrid continues to make history. Buy football tickets to see Real Madrid in action this season and visit their fully renovated stadium. Not only will you enjoy a top-tier football spectacle, but you'll also be amazed by the stunning architecture of the new Bernabéu. Don't miss the chance to be part of this unforgettable experience and make sure to reserve your Real Madrid tickets today.
Events.paragraph_2: Be part of the legend! Santiago Bernabéu opens its doors for you to experience what it means to be a true Madridista. Enjoy watching Real Madrid from the best seats, feel the adrenaline of the big matches, and become a part of an unforgettable game.
Events.text_1: If you can't attend the event due to a change of plans or inconveniences, no problem, we will buy the ticket and take care of the management of it entirely.
Events.text_2: Selling football tickets with Pointickets is easy and fast. You just have to follow these four simple steps:
Events.step2: 2. List your tickets by entering the necessary details, such as the match, category, and location, and enter your banking information.
Events.step3: 3. Once your ticket is approved, it will be published on our website, and once it is purchased.
Events.step4: 4. Accept the offer and receive payment securely.
Events.text_3: It's that easy and fast! With Pointickets, you ensure that your sale of football tickets will be a success. Start selling today!
Events.title_intro: Top Sports Events of the Moment
Events.sell_title: Sell Your Sports Tickets in 4 Easy Steps

ContactUs.title: Contact us
ContactUs.second_title: Our customer service team is available to help you with any questions or issues you may have.
ContactUs.text: We would love to hear from you! If you have questions, suggestions, or need assistance, we are here to help. You can write to us through the form or call us at the number below. Our team will be happy to assist you as soon as possible. You can also find us on our social media. Don't hesitate to contact us!
ContactUs.readed: I have read and accept the

Buy.looking_tickets: What tickets are you looking for?

Checkout.name: Name
Checkout.your_transaction: Your transactions are secure thanks to our 3D Secure payment system. This means that when you have paid, your bank card entity will ask you for a code sent via SMS to validate that you are purchasing correctly.
Checkout.we_use: Additionally, we use SSL security technology to protect all your personal data.

purchase_questions.title: Questions about buying tickets:
purchase_questions.seats_together_text: Yes, tickets purchased from the same listing will be together, unless otherwise specified during the purchase confirmation process.
purchase_questions.seat_location_title: Where will my seats be located?
purchase_questions.seat_location_text: All available details about your seat location are displayed in your confirmation email.

delivery_questions.title: Questions about how to receive my tickets:
delivery_questions.when_receive_tickets_title: When will I receive my tickets?
delivery_questions.when_receive_tickets_text: You will receive your tickets, including electronic tickets, in the week leading up to the event, as organizers usually issue tickets very close to the event date, often within the same week.
delivery_questions.instant_download_tickets_text: If you purchased instant download electronic tickets, you will be able to print them almost immediately.
delivery_questions.track_order_status_text: You can track the status of your order in the Purchases section.
delivery_questions.ensure_receive_on_time_title: Ways to ensure you receive your tickets on time:
delivery_questions.ensure_receive_on_time_text_1: Make sure your delivery address is correct. Check your delivery address here.
delivery_questions.ensure_receive_on_time_text_2: Ensure you choose a delivery address where someone can sign for the delivery, such as your workplace.
delivery_questions.ensure_receive_on_time_text_3: If you are traveling to the event, add your travel address and the start date of your trip as soon as possible, and we will make sure the tickets are sent to the correct location.
delivery_questions.ensure_receive_on_time_text_4: Ensure that the phone number listed on your account is correct, in case we need to contact you.

pricing_questions.price_difference_title: Why is the price on the ticket different from what I paid?
pricing_questions.price_difference_text: Tickets on Pointickets are sold at prices that may be above, below, or equal to the nominal value displayed on the ticket.
pricing_questions.price_demand_text: The price of tickets for the most popular events may be higher than the nominal value due to high demand. At Pointickets, many tickets are sold for less than the nominal price.

name_on_ticket_questions.different_name_title: Why does my ticket show someone else's name?
name_on_ticket_questions.different_name_text: Pointickets allows third parties, including individuals, to sell tickets on its platform. In some cases, the name of the original buyer may appear on the ticket. The ticket remains valid. Your name does not need to match the name on the ticket for you to access the event.
name_on_ticket_questions.personalize_ticket_text: If it is necessary to personalize the ticket with the attendee's name, our Customer Service team will contact you.

cancellation_questions.cancel_purchase_text: Customer satisfaction is essential to us, but as a platform for ticket exchange between individuals, our transactions are final, so neither the buyer nor the seller can cancel the order on their part. These policies ensure the application of the FanProtect Guarantee for all our customers.
cancellation_questions.customer_service_text: However, if you have problems attending the event after the purchase, please contact our Customer Service team, and we will try to offer you the best possible solution.

contact_questions.email_us_text: You can email us at email, and we will respond as soon as possible.

intro.title: Privacy Policy
intro.text: This Privacy Policy sets out the basis on which Platinumtickets SL (hereinafter, 'we' or the 'Data Controller') with registered office at Villa de Marín 4 28029 - Madrid, Spain, B10526994, a company currently operating in Spain, processes your personal data when you provide them during your experience through the website https://www.pointickets.com (hereinafter, 'the Website'). We also remind you that each time you use the Website, provide us with, or it is necessary for us to access any information that by its nature allows us to identify you, such as your name and surname, email, billing or shipping addresses, phone number, device type, or debit or credit card number, etc. (hereinafter, 'Personal Data'), whether to browse the website, purchase our products, or use its services or functionalities, you will be subject to this Privacy Policy, along with the General Terms of the Website, and other referenced documents in effect at the time. Please review these texts to ensure you agree with them. This Privacy Policy and our General Terms may be modified. It is your responsibility to read them periodically, as those in effect at the time of using the Website will apply. In the context of distance selling, it is mandatory to provide certain personal information as this information is necessary for processing and delivering products and preparing your invoices. Such personal information is strictly confidential. Failure to provide such personal information would make it impossible to complete the purchase. By accepting these General Terms, the User expressly consents to their Personal Data being incorporated into the Personal Data File and subject to automated processing by Platinumtickets SL for the purposes mentioned above.

personal_data.title: Personal Data
personal_data.text: Personal Data refers to any information or data that can directly (e.g., your name) or indirectly identify you (e.g., your national ID or D.N.I.). Personal Data includes information such as email / postal addresses / mobile phone numbers, usernames, profile images, personal preferences and shopping habits, user-generated content, financial information, and welfare information, among others. It may also include unique numeric identifiers like your computer's IP address or your mobile device's MAC address, as well as information obtained through cookies. This Policy covers all personal data collected and used by Pointickets.

data_collection.title: Collection of Personal Data and Purposes of Processing
data_collection.text: Remember that before starting to use any of our services or functionalities, you should read this Policy, as well as the General Terms of use for the specific section related to that service or functionality. In that section, you will see if there are any specific conditions for its use or if specific processing of your Personal Data is required.
data_collection.text2: Failure to provide certain information marked as mandatory may make it impossible to manage your registration as a user or use certain functionalities or services available through https://www.pointickets.com.
data_collection.text3: By the present, the user (you) guarantees that the Personal Data provided is true and accurate and undertakes to notify any changes or modifications to them. Any loss or damage caused to the Website, the Data Controllers, or any third party by communicating erroneous, inaccurate, or incomplete information in registration forms will be the sole responsibility of the user.

data_usage.title: How Do We Use Your Data?
data_usage.text: We and our service providers use personal information for the following purposes:
data_usage.text1: Providing the functionality of the Services, such as organizing access to your registered account, allowing you to purchase tickets, managing your relationship with us, and providing related benefits, special promotions, or customer service;
data_usage.text2: Responding to your inquiries and fulfilling your requests, when you contact us through one of our online contact forms or otherwise, for example, when you send us questions, suggestions, compliments, or complaints, or when you request a quote or other information about our Services.
data_usage.text3: Carrying out the transactions you perform, processing returns and exchanges, verifying your information, and providing related benefits, special promotions, or customer service.
data_usage.text4: Sending you administrative information, such as changes to our terms, conditions, and policies.
data_usage.text5: Enabling you to send messages to another person through the Services if you choose to do so.

data_analysis.title: Personal Data Analysis
data_analysis.text: Analyzing personal data for the preparation of business reports and the provision of personalized services.

promotions.title: Participation in Promotions
promotions.text: Allowing your participation in sweepstakes, contests, or other promotions. We may offer you the opportunity to participate in sweepstakes, contests, or other promotions. Some of these promotions have additional rules containing information about how we will use and disclose your personal information. Please read those additional rules before choosing to participate.

business_purposes.title: Commercial Purposes
business_purposes.text: Analyzing personal data for the preparation of business reports and the provision of personalized services.
business_purposes.text1: Analyzing or predicting our users' preferences to create aggregated trend reports on the use of our digital content, so we can improve our Services.
business_purposes.text2: Better understanding your interests and preferences, so we can personalize our interactions with you and provide you with information and/or offers, coupons, discounts, and special promotions tailored to your interests.
business_purposes.text3: We will provide personalized services based on our legitimate interests and with your consent to the extent required by applicable law.

premio.title: Allowing you to participate in sweepstakes, contests, or other promotions
premio.text1: We may offer you the opportunity to participate in sweepstakes, contests, or other promotions.
premio.text2: Some of these promotions have additional rules containing information about how we will use and disclose your personal information. Please read those additional rules before choosing to participate.

comercial.title: Fulfilling Our Commercial Purposes
comercial.text1: Conducting audits to verify that our internal processes function as expected and to comply with legal, regulatory, or contractual requirements.
comercial.text2: Preventing and detecting fraud attempts and monitoring anti-fraud security to, for example, verify your identity as part of our authentication process, comply with our legal or regulatory requirements, and detect and prevent cyberattacks or identity theft attempts.
comercial.text3: For training and quality purposes and to investigate any claims you may make, or as evidence in any anticipated dispute or litigation between you and us.
comercial.text5: Enhancing, improving, repairing, maintaining, or modifying our current products and services, as well as undertaking quality and security assurance measures.
comercial.text6: Identifying usage trends, for example, understanding which parts of our Services are of most interest to users.
comercial.text7: Determining the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns so that we can tailor our campaigns to the needs and interests of our users.
comercial.text8: For the operation and expansion of our business activities, for example, understanding which parts of our Services are of most interest to our users so we can focus our efforts on meeting our users' interests.
comercial.conclusion: We engage in these activities to manage our contractual relationship with you, to comply with a legal obligation, and/or based on our legitimate interest.

data_transfer.title: Data Transfer
data_transfer.text: The Personal Data we collect from you may be transferred to, accessed from, and stored at a destination outside the European Economic Area (EEA). They may also be processed by staff operating outside the EEA who work for us or for one of our service providers.
data_transfer.text1: Service providers located outside the EEA, such as Facebook, Inc. or Google, LLC, may access your personal data. These service providers adhere to the Privacy Shield and are therefore required to protect your personal data under a set of well-defined safeguards established by the European Union.

data_retention.title: Personal Data Retention
data_retention.text: We only retain your Personal Data for as long as we need it for the purpose for which we process your Personal Data, to meet your needs, or to comply with our legal obligations.
data_retention.text1: We may retain some personal data to comply with our legal or regulatory obligations, as well as to manage our rights (for example, to enforce our claims in court) or for statistical or historical purposes.
data_retention.text2: When we no longer need to use your personal data, it will be deleted from our systems and records, or anonymized so that we can no longer identify you.
data_retention.text3: We do not offer or sell your personal data.

data_storage.title: Personal Data Storage
data_storage.text: We are committed to protecting your Personal Data and taking all reasonable precautions to do so. We contractually require trusted third parties that handle your Personal Data to do the same.
data_storage.text2: We always do our best to protect your Personal Data, and once we have received your personal information, we use strict procedures and security features to try to prevent unauthorized access. As the transmission of information over the Internet is not completely secure, we cannot guarantee the security of your data transmitted to our Website, and any transmission is at your own risk.

privacy_rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
privacy_rights.text: Applicable data protection laws grant you the right to object to the processing of your data in certain circumstances, particularly for direct marketing purposes, for profiling related to direct marketing, and for other legitimate interests in processing. If you no longer wish to receive our marketing-related emails, you can do so by selecting the 'unsubscribe' option in the marketing communications we send you or by changing your account preferences at any time. Please note that if you choose to stop receiving our marketing emails, we may still send you important administrative messages, from which you cannot opt-out.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you have any questions or concerns about how we process and use your personal data or if you wish to exercise any of the rights described above, please contact the email provided in the header.

comunicate.title: Communicate with you, providing our newsletter and/or other marketing materials, and facilitating social sharing.
comunicate.text1: Sending you marketing-related emails with information about our services, new products, and other news related to our company.
comunicate.text2: Gathering your opinions through surveys or questionnaires.
comunicate.text3: Contacting you about public policy matters or other current events related to your ability to use our Services. This could include an invitation to join a petition, write a letter, make a call, or engage in other public policy-related campaigns.
comunicate.text4: Communicating with you by phone, mail, email, text messages (SMS), instant messaging, or other electronic means in accordance with applicable law.
comunicate.text5: Enabling the social sharing functionality you choose to use.
comunicate.text6: We will engage in this activity with your consent or when we have a legitimate interest.

terms_condition.introduction: Platinumtickets SL provides a service through its website: http://www.pointickets.com, which allows users who wish to purchase tickets ('Buyers') to find users who want to sell them ('Sellers'). Pointickets does not own the tickets, and the actual transactions involving the tickets take place between Buyers and Sellers. Once the Buyer and Seller have agreed on a transaction, all transactions are covered by the Pointickets Guarantee. Pointickets' obligations are solely related to the mediation service. By accepting these terms, Users release Pointickets from any responsibility not imposed by law resulting from the transactions made on the Portal as a result of the relationship between buyer and seller.
terms_condition.guarantee_content: The price of the tickets will be set by the seller, being a decision independent of Pointickets, which will only charge for the management fees generated by the mediation service. Since Pointickets does not own or possess the tickets, it cannot guarantee that they match the seller's offer or their authenticity. However, Pointickets offers a guarantee to the buyer that the seller will not receive the ticket price until the buyer has been able to enjoy the event or show. If the tickets do not correspond to what the seller offered and the buyer cannot attend the event, a refund will be issued. If the ticket allows access to the event, but its quality does not match the seller's offer, the buyer will be entitled to compensation through a refund of a percentage of the ticket price, which will be determined by Pointickets in proportion to the damage caused. When you sell tickets on Pointickets, as long as you send the exact number of tickets offered for sale and the buyer successfully accesses the event, Pointickets guarantees you will be paid for your sale.
terms_condition.contracting_content: The contract begins when the purchase is confirmed and ends when the event for which the item was purchased is over. All purchases are subject to payment card verification and other security checks, and your transaction may be canceled if it does not pass our verification process.
terms_condition.user_registration_obligations: Access to this website is the sole responsibility of users and implies acceptance and acknowledgment of the legal policies, conditions, and terms of use contained herein. The purpose of the website is to mediate between users who own tickets and wish to sell them and users who wish to buy tickets. To become a user of the Portal, prior registration is required, at which time the General Conditions will be accepted. Only individuals of legal age with full legal capacity may register, providing the data requested by Pointickets in the registration form.
terms_condition.username_password_security: The User is solely responsible for maintaining the security of their username and password, as well as any actions taken under their username or password.
terms_condition.username_suspicion: In case of suspicion of unauthorized access to the user's account by a third party, the User must contact customer service as soon as possible.
terms_condition.veracity_of_information_content: When the User completes the service access form, they are assigned a username (which coincides with the email address provided in the registration form) and an access password, which can be modified by the user. The user is solely responsible for maintaining the security of their username and password and any actions taken under their username or password, so we recommend not disclosing this information to any third party. In case of suspicion of unauthorized access to the user’s account by a third party, the User must contact customer service as soon as possible, and Pointickets will not be liable for any damages caused by such unauthorized access.
terms_condition.ticket_sale_title: Ticket Sales, Seller Obligations and Rights
terms_condition.ticket_sale_obligations: The Seller must provide accurate and complete information about the tickets. If the tickets do not match the published offer or are unavailable, the penalties outlined in section 3 will apply, as well as possible compensation to the Buyer.
terms_condition.ticket_sale_obligations_second: The price of the ticket will be set by the seller. If a surcharge is applied to the ticket price, such a surcharge must comply with applicable law, and the Seller assumes all responsibility for any unauthorized surcharges, exonerating Pointickets from any responsibility.
terms_condition.seller_guarantee: Guarantee and Payment Method: The credit or debit card provided by the user upon registration as a User will serve as a guarantee of the accuracy and completeness of the information offered regarding the tickets for sale, as well as for any failure to deliver the ticket to the buyer once the offer has been accepted.
terms_condition.seller_guarantee_not: If for any reason the Seller does not fulfill the sales contract with the buyer, there will be certain circumstances under which Pointickets may charge the Seller’s credit or debit card or adjust the Seller's pending balance. This credit or debit card must have an expiration date later than the event for which the Seller is selling a ticket.
terms_condition.seller_noncompliance_cases: Pointickets will apply financial penalties to all Sellers who fail to successfully complete the ticket transfer process. This penalty will be reflected in the Seller's payment balance and will be automatically applied by Pointickets whenever the Seller’s breach conditions are met. In addition to penalties, deductions or even a refund to the buyer may be applied when the Seller's offer does not match reality, in order to compensate the buyer.
terms_condition.nocompliance1: Incorrect tickets: a ticket different from the one listed is sent, regardless of whether it is subjectively considered equal or better than the listed one;
terms_condition.nocompliance2: Replacement or Substitution of the Sale: Pointickets has to activate its ticket replacement operation to complete a purchase where the Seller has failed or defaulted;
terms_condition.nocompliance3: Invalid tickets or Failed Sale if the ticket provided by the Seller does not allow the buyer access to the venue due to duplication, forgery, deterioration, or any condition that directly affects access. In addition, this could result in fraud or forgery offenses. This case also carries an extra penalty in compensation to the buyer.
terms_condition.nocompliance4: Others: in the event that a refund or reimbursement is made to the buyer for any reason for which the Seller is responsible for not fulfilling their transaction.
terms_condition.nocompliance_text: Likewise, Pointickets reserves the right to close or terminate the accounts of any Seller who violates the terms set forth in this document.
terms_condition.buyer_obligations_title: Purchase of Tickets, Buyer's Rights and Obligations
terms_condition.buyer_obligations_content: The buyer interested in acquiring any of the ticket sale offers must expressly accept the present General Conditions in their entirety.
terms_condition.buyer_obligations_content2: The buyer is aware that the purchase price of the ticket may not match the price printed on the ticket, which could be higher or lower, depending on the offer made by the Seller, who is a user independent of Pointickets.
terms_condition.buyer_obligations_content3: Once the purchase has been confirmed by email by Pointickets, it can no longer be modified or canceled. The buyer understands and agrees that all purchases from Pointickets are final, meaning they accept the prices set by the Seller, the cost of management fees for the mediation service provided by Pointickets, and any shipping fees that may be generated by courier or delivery service.
terms_condition.buyer_obligations_content4: In short, once the terms are accepted, the buyer implicitly expresses their consent to the purchase made, the price paid for the transaction, and the other conditions established at the time of the transaction.
terms_condition.buyer_obligations_content5: The buyer understands and agrees that tickets purchased through Pointickets will not necessarily be delivered instantly after the purchase and may be delayed up to the maximum time allowed for each ticket format, with delivery potentially occurring even on the day of the event.
terms_condition.buyer_obligations_content6: In no case will the failure to deliver these tickets within the stipulated times for Sellers entitle the buyer to initiate a return, claim, or complaint to Pointickets.
terms_condition.season_ticket_return_content: Tickets offered as Season Tickets must be returned after the match for which they were purchased in the days following the event.
terms_condition.season_ticket_return_content2: As a general rule, Pointickets will contact the Buyer through the information provided by the User in their account to arrange the terms and conditions of that return.
terms_condition.season_ticket_return_content3: If the Buyer does not respond to Pointickets’ communications and, therefore, does not return those season tickets, Pointickets will charge the Buyer’s credit or debit card €150.00 for each ticket as a replacement fee. This penalty is independent of the decisions the Seller may make regarding the Buyer.
terms_condition.product_responsibility_content: The website owner reserves the right to unilaterally modify the configuration of their website at any time without prior notice. All purchase orders are binding for the customer. Once the order is placed, existing requests cannot be canceled.
terms_condition.product_responsibility_content2: All tickets are subject to availability.
terms_condition.product_responsibility_content3: When a customer buys more than one ticket in their ticket package, it cannot be 100% guaranteed that the tickets will be together or in the same section or row, although www.pointickets.com will do everything possible to place them as close as possible.
terms_condition.product_responsibility_content4: If for any reason the owner of www.pointickets.com cannot provide the ticket or the item requested, the user will be offered a similar or higher category ticket or a refund of the purchase price. The refund amount will depend on whether www.pointickets.com can provide the requested ticket, and in the absence of such provision, the refund will be processed.
terms_condition.product_responsibility_content5: If for any reason it is impossible to obtain the tickets that make up the package purchased by the customer or offer any solution www.entradasmadrid.com will only have the obligation to refund 100% of the amount paid by the customer.
terms_condition.product_responsibility_content6: The owner of the website acts as an intermediary on its behalf with the real suppliers of the services. Although we will attempt to pass on any claims made by the customer to them, our liability to the customer will be in accordance with the supplier's policy and will be limited to the service and amount invoiced. We are not involved in transactions between buyers and sellers. If you have a dispute with one or more users, you release Pointickets and all affiliated companies, officers, directors, agents, parent company, subsidiaries, legal representatives and employees from claims, demands and damages (actual and consequential) of every kind and nature, known and unknown, suspected and unsuspected, disclosed and concealed, arising out of or in any way connected with the dispute.
terms_condition.event_changes_title: Cancellation, postponement, and other changes to events
terms_condition.event_changes_content: The different events may, for reasons beyond www.pointickets.com and which are the responsibility of the Event Organisers, modify their date and time, especially football matches as it is common for matches to be brought forward to Saturday or also played on Sunday nights or undergo other changes. The change of date or time will not give reason for the refund of the tickets by customers who have purchased tickets, consequently there will be no economic refund by the owner of the website. When booking your football tickets, you should be aware that matches scheduled for Sundays may change to Saturday or Monday, and matches scheduled for Wednesdays may change to Tuesdays or Thursdays, due to European competition obligations and television broadcasts.
terms_condition.event_changes_content2: In this sense, www.pointickets.com is not responsible for the change of date and time by the organizer of the event. An event that does not have a confirmed day or time will have as a default date one of the days on which the event can be held according to the dates given by the organization of the event. It is the user's responsibility to be informed of the confirmation of the time and date as well as of any possible changes. The organizer or promoter of the event is responsible for changes in schedules and days, who will be responsible for any claims that may arise from such changes, however our company will try to facilitate as much as possible the claims for changes in dates and times in the events and complying with the requirements to which we are obliged according to current legislation. When an event is DEFINITIVELY CANCELLED due to force majeure, inclement weather, strikes... The amount paid by the customer will be refunded except
terms_condition.returns_content: The refund of the amount paid to the owner of the website for the purchase of tickets is not allowed. The impossibility of attending an event or show or the commission of an error when booking the ticket(s) are not reasons that allow their refund. The user may not exercise the right of withdrawal or termination, in accordance with current regulations on consumption and retail trade regulation. In accordance with Article 3 of DIRECTIVE 97/7/EC, this type of contract is among the exceptions that the regulations provide for exercising the right of withdrawal.
terms_condition.intellectual_property_content: All trademarks, trade names or distinctive signs of any kind that appear on the Portal are the property of Pointickets or third parties, and it cannot be understood that the use of or access to the Portal and the Services attributes to the User any right over the aforementioned trademarks, trade names and/or distinctive signs.
terms_condition.intellectual_property_content2: The Contents are the industrial or intellectual property of Pointickets and may not be transferred to the User, by virtue of the provisions of these Conditions, the rights of the Users are those determined in these conditions of use.
terms_condition.jurisdiction_content: The provision of the service of this website and these Terms of Use are governed in each and every one of its extremes by common Spanish and commercial law, where applicable. In the event of the provision of services that have effects outside the territory of Spain, in accordance with article 10.5 of the Civil Code, the parties agree to submit to Spanish law. The parties will submit any disputes arising from the fulfilment and interpretation of these Conditions to the Courts and Tribunals of Madrid, except in the cases established in article 90.2 of Royal Legislative Decree 1/2007 of 16 November, which approves the revised text of the General Law for the Defence of Consumers and Users and other complementary laws. Notwithstanding the foregoing, the parties shall do everything reasonably necessary to resolve disputes amicably

entity.title: 1. Organizing Entity
entity.text: WANDERLUST DREAMS SL (hereinafter referred to as “the Company”), with registered office at Avenida El Ferrol 4, 28029 Madrid, and NIF B56956220, organizes a contest called 'Real Madrid vs Valladolid Match Raffle' (hereinafter referred to as 'the Contest') to be held on the Instagram platform.

participation.title: 2. Participation
participation.text: All individuals over 18 years old, with legal residence in Spain, who follow the Company’s Instagram account and comply with the conditions set forth in these legal terms, are eligible to participate in the Contest.

requirements.title: 3. Participation Requirements
requirements.text:
To participate in the Contest, users must meet the following requirements:
Follow the Company’s official Instagram account: pointickets
Tag a friend in the comments of the Contest post.
Each participant may comment as many times as they wish, as long as they tag different friends in each comment. Comments tagging celebrities, public figures, or fake accounts will not be allowed.

duration.title: 4. Contest Duration
duration.text: The Contest will begin on August 5, 2024, at 00:01 and end on August 20, 2024, at 23:59.

prize.title: 5. Prize
prize.text: The prize consists of two tickets for two people to attend the Real Madrid vs Valladolid match, which will take place on August 25, 2024, at Santiago Bernabéu Stadium.

winner_selection.title: 6. Winner Selection
winner_selection.text: The winner will be randomly selected using a comment selection tool on August 21, 2024. The result of the raffle will be announced the same day on the Company’s Instagram account.

winner_communication.title: 7. Winner Communication
winner_communication.text: The Company will contact the winner via direct message on Instagram. If the winner does not respond within 48 hours, the Company reserves the right to select a new winner.

prize_delivery.title: 8. Prize Delivery
prize_delivery.text: The prize delivery will be coordinated directly with the winner through the means deemed most appropriate by the Company. The prize is non-transferable and cannot be exchanged for cash or any other prize.

data_protection.title: 9. Personal Data Protection
data_protection.text: In accordance with the current data protection regulations, the Company informs participants that their personal data will be processed in accordance with its Privacy Policy, available at https://pointickets.com/.

legal_acceptance.title: 10. Acceptance of Legal Terms
legal_acceptance.text: Participation in the Contest implies full acceptance of these legal terms. The Company reserves the right to modify the Contest terms at any time without prior notice, committing to properly publicize the new terms and conditions, if any.

disclaimer.title: 11. Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: Instagram does not sponsor, endorse, or administer this Contest in any way, nor is it associated with it. Participants release Instagram from any liability arising from the development of this Contest.

applicable_law.title: 12. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
applicable_law.text:
This Contest will be governed by Spanish law. For the resolution of any dispute or conflict that may arise in relation to this Contest, the parties submit to the jurisdiction of the Courts and Tribunals of the city of Madrid.
For any questions regarding the Contest, participants can contact the Company by phone at +34 689 89 86 36.

Tour.title: Tour of the Bernabéu - Experience the History of Real Madrid
Tour.second_title: Explore the Santiago Bernabéu Tour and Immerse Yourself in the Legend of Football
Tour.second_text: If you want to dive into the rich history of Real Madrid and its legendary stadium, the Tour of the Bernabéu is the perfect experience. Explore every corner of this iconic stadium, from its museum filled with trophies and historical memorabilia to the stunning panoramic views of the city. Don't miss the opportunity to discover Madrid from one of its most emblematic and central points. Experience the thrill of being in the same place where so many pages of football history have been written and book your ticket for the Tour of the Bernabéu today.
Tour.third_title: What Does the Tour of the Bernabéu Include?
Tour.third_text: Experience a unique adventure with the Tour of the Bernabéu, where you can immerse yourself in the history and greatness of Real Madrid. Walk through the stadium from the pitch to the trophy rooms, passing by the players' locker room. With Pointickets, you have several options to enjoy this tour, including standard and VIP tickets that allow you to explore at your own pace or with expert guides. Don't miss the chance to walk where football legends have walked. Book your ticket and make your Madridista dream come true!
